chapters.title: Chapter 20: The Golden Crane
chapters.info: Karldin Manfor, p. 425—Asha'man who accompanied Loial to all the stedding and former Ogier groves to seal the Waygates there or warn others to monitor them. Like Flinn and Narishma, he was on the Deserter's List, as was every Asha'man that works with Rand. He has since been removed from the list. He accompanied Bashere to negotiate with Suroth. See also Nyram, Beldeine.
